channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Olevmedia Shortcodes
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Olevmedia Shortcodes

item.title: CVE-2023-0168|2024-08-02T05:02:43.707Z -- unknown -- olevmedia%20shortcodes
item.description: The Olevmedia Shortcodes WordPress plugin through 1.1.9 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
